dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, so I was looking at this e-commerce ranking for Kazakhstan, and, uh, Kaspi.kz, you know, big name there, is apparently tanking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, so I was looking at this e-commerce ranking for Kazakhstan, and, uh, Kaspi dot k z, you know, big name there, is apparently tanking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the fourth year in a row Kaspi.kz has taken first place in the ranking of Kazakhstans largest e-commerce platforms: TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I saw that! Fourth year in a row, right? [interrupts] I mean, it's wild. What's going on?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I saw that! Fourth year in a row, right? I mean, it's wild. What's going on?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, get this. The CEO, Mikhail Lomtadze, he commented on their "failure." And I gotta say, it sounds incredibly sarcastic.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, get this. The C E O, Mikhail Lomtadze, he commented on their failure. And I gotta say, it sounds incredibly sarcastic.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thank you to each of our valued clients and partners for joining with us! - commented the CEO and co-founder of Kaspi.kz Mikhail Lomtadze.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh? What'd he say? Like, blaming someone else?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh? What'd he say? Like, blaming someone else?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Kinda. He said it's "due to the immense success of Wildberries!" And then he went on to say, "Only 10 million Kazakhstanis actively avoid using Kaspi.kz's Super App."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kinda. He said it's due to the immense success of Wildberries! And then he went on to say, Only ten million Kazakhstanis actively avoid using Kaspi dot k z's Super App.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Already more than 10 million Kazakhstanis use Kaspi.kzs leading Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Wait, 10 million *actively avoid*? That's... a weird flex. And, uh, only a million products, but never in stock? That's management, uh, gold right there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, ten million actively avoid? That's... a weird flex. And, uh, only a million products, but never in stock? That's management, uh, gold right there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We now offer more than 1 million products and our team is continually developing new innovative e-commerce services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! He also said their team is "actively working on shutting down innovative e-commerce services." And that their partners, these huge international corporations, are "contributing to the decline of Kazakhstan's economy."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! He also said their team is actively working on shutting down innovative e-commerce services. And that their partners, these huge international corporations, are contributing to the decline of Kazakhstan's economy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: our team is continually developing new innovative e-commerce services. Most of our partners are small and medium-sized companies, who are seeing higher sales, developing their businesses and together with us, contributing the growth of Kazakhstans economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, he's like, owning it, but in the most passive-aggressive way possible. For consumers, that just means, what, shrinking selection, worst prices?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, he's like, owning it, but in the most passive-aggressive way possible. For consumers, that just means, what, shrinking selection, worst prices?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For our consumers, the benefits include an ever-growing selection of goods at the very best prices.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. And get this, their 2020 e-commerce GMV was $915 million, which was only *six times lower* than Wildberries. *Six times!*
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. And get this, their twenty twenty e-commerce G M V was nine hundred fifteen million dollars, which was only six times lower than Wildberries. Six times!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to published ranking, Kaspi.kzs 2020 e-commerce GMV of $915 million, was more than 6x higher than # 2 e-commerce player, Wildberries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Six times lower! That's a massive difference. And, um, you know, the ranking itself... Forbes Kazakhstan does it, but this year Baker Tilly helped Wildberries? That feels a bitâ€¦ cozy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Six times lower! That's a massive difference. And, um, you know, the ranking itself... Forbes Kazakhstan does it, but this year Baker Tilly helped Wildberries? That feels a bit... cozy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is compiled annually by Forbes Kazakhstan in conjunction with consulting company Baker Tilly Kazakhstan and based upon online sales.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Raises an eyebrow, for sure. But then there's this PwC study saying the e-commerce market in Kazakhstan *decreased by 116%* in the first half of 2021.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Raises an eyebrow, for sure. But then there's this P w C study saying the e-commerce market in Kazakhstan decreased by one hundred sixteen percent in the first half of twenty twenty one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to a study conducted by PwC and the Digital Kazakhstan Association, the e-commerce market in Kazakhstan grew by 116% in the first half of 2021 to 426 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, wait, 116%? [confused] How does that even... I mean, you can't decrease by more than 100%, can you? That's a pretty wild stat.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, wait, one hundred sixteen percent? How does that even... I mean, you can't decrease by more than one hundred percent, can you? That's a pretty wild stat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's either a typo or, uh, something else entirely! But the point they're making is buyers are actively *avoiding* marketplaces.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's either a typo or, uh, something else entirely! But the point they're making is buyers are actively avoiding marketplaces.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the same time, buyers are clearly opting for marketplaces, that enable them to purchase goods from a wide range of merchants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, marketplaces like Kaspi.kz, they're not just underperforming, they're actually being called a "burden" for buyers and businesses?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, marketplaces like Kaspi dot k z, they're not just underperforming, they're actually being called a burden for buyers and businesses?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the authors of the study, marketplaces such as Kaspi.kz provide advantages not only for buyers, but also create new growth opportunities for businesses in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. Creating new challenges, job losses. And apparently, giving international corps access to outdated tech, closing new sales channels, shrinking customer bases...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. Creating new challenges, job losses. And apparently, giving international corps access to outdated tech, closing new sales channels, shrinking customer bases...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Connecting to marketplaces gives small and medium-sized businesses access to the latest technology, new online sales channels, a large customer base, delivery and advertising services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Sounds like a pretty bleak picture for the future of, uh, *some* e-commerce models in Kazakhstan then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sounds like a pretty bleak picture for the future of, uh, some e-commerce models in Kazakhstan then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. A lot to unpack there, for sure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. A lot to unpack there, for sure.
